name: SBC-Mining
description: SBC-Mining - Everything about cryptocurrency / cryptomining on single board computers. All income will be used to test and host further projects for you.

about.me: Single pool operater from Germany. I try to generate some types of crypto on single board computers in different ways in order to enable people in countries where people are not doing so well and who have hardly any money the possibility of passive income. Therefore, 100% of all income goes into this and other projects
about.server: Raspberry Pi 4 8GB powered with green energy. My equipment currently consists of 1 Block Producer and 2 Relay Nodes. I can guarantee an excellent internet connection (Glasfiber 1Gigabit) whit fallback to LTE and a big Battery Pack for Power failure.

name: ADASRN
description: Growing wealth together. We keep costs low for the community with a 1% margin.

about.me: We are Malaysians who want to participate in the Cardano network as we believe DeFi is the future. We are glad to be part of the 100 pools chosen for the second cohort of 2021 to receive the IOG delegation fund. This would help us attract more delegators as we can now prove the capability of our pool operations. We are donating some of our proceedings to charity once we have received enough delegation to become profitable. Follow our Twitter page to chat and/or keep up with us.
about.server: We have 3 separate bare metal nodes which comprise of 2 Relay nodes and 1 Block producing node. As fans of the little Raspberry Pi, 2 of our bare metal nodes (1 relay and 1 block producer), are run from Raspberry Pi 4B 8GB units with binaries built from source for the aarch64 architecture. For redundancy, we have an additional AMD64 Linux PC which can take the place of either the block producer or relay when performing extended maintenance. Our OS of choice is Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (for the relays) and AlpineOS 3.13.5 (for the block producer).

name: Cardano ADA Mini Pool Switzerland
description: A reliable and eco-friendly stake pool running on Raspberry Pi's

about.me: Dedicated Cardano pool operator located in Weiningen, Zurich. Always put sustainability first. Big supporter of the Cardano dream and vision.
about.server: The entire pool is running on totally 3 Raspberry Pi's, 1 Core and 2 Relays. The entire power consumption including router is 30 Watt. The electricity comes from 100% hydropower-plants from Switzerland and abroad.

name: MEME Pool
description: They don't know I run a Cardano stake pool.

about.server: The MEME stake pool runs on a trio of Raspberry Pi microcomputers with SSD hard drives and a gigabit fiber optic connection to the internet. Our servers consume about 0.2kWh per day, which is about the same as running one 9W (60W equivalent) LED light bulb.
